Articles.Content: I have recently upgraded my Mac and re-installed KSP. All of the mods I used on the old one function fine now, including KW, FAR, Hot Rockets, and Docking Port Alignment, the only mod that doesn't work is B9. On my old Mac I downloaded the pack from spaceport and all was peachy. When I upgraded, the mod would prevent the game from launching (I checked by reinstalling every other mod). So I downloaded the unofficial pack from Curse. Although this made progress, the game would freeze after entering the VAB or R&D. If anyone has an answer or could help, that would be great!
